title: The non-unital ring of even integers

blocks.name: 0even
blocks.content: 0 is an even integer. (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0even(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wcel(nat0, c0)
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eleqtrri(nat0, c0, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(nat0, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))), wcel(nat0, cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  0z()
  ax-mp(wrex(s1, cz, wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))), wcel(nat2, cc))
  2cn()
  rspcedvd(s1, cz, nat0, wcel(nat2, cc), wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, nat0)))
  0zd(wcel(nat2, cc))
  adantl(wcel(nat2, cc), wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wb(wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, nat0))))
  eqeq2d(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), co(nat2, cmul, nat0), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  oveq2(cv(s1), nat0, nat2, cmul)
  eqcomd(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, nat0), wcel(nat2, cc))
  mul01(nat2)
  elrab(s0, nat0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, nat2, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, nat0, co(nat2, cmul, nat0))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat2, cmul, nat0)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cz, wceq(nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, nat0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, cv(s1))
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: 1neven
blocks.content: 1 is not an even integer. (Contributed by AV, 12-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1neven(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wnel(nat1, c0)
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  nelir(nat1, c0)
  mtbir(wcel(nat1, c0), wa(wcel(nat1, cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  intnan(wcel(nat1, cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  nrex(s1, cz, wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  mtbid(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cv(s1)))
  mtoi(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cv(s1)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cz))
  halfnz()
  eleq1a(cv(s1), cz, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  syl3anc(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wb(wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cv(s1)), wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(cv(s1), cc), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  1cnd(wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  zcn(cv(s1))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  2cnne0()
  divmul2(nat1, cv(s1), nat2)
  elrab2(s0, nat1, c0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cz, wceq(nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, cv(s1))
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: 2zlidl
blocks.content: The even integers are a (left) ideal of the ring of integers. (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2zlidl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(c0, c1)
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clidl, zring))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir3an(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, cz), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(hs0, cz, wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), c0)))))
  eqsstri(c0, cz, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  ssrab2(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  ne0ii(c0, nat0)
  0even(s0, s1, c0)
  rgen(hs0, cz, wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), c0))))
  ralrimivva(hs1, hs2, c0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), c0))
  sylan2b(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), c0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  elrab2(s0, cv(hs1), c0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))
  elrab2(s0, cv(hs2), c0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), c0), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  zaddcld(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))))
  zmulcld(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))))
  simprll(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(hs2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cz))

blocks.name: 2zrng
blocks.content: The ring of integers restricted to the even integers is a (non-unital) ring, the "ring of even integers". Remark: the structure of the complementary subset of the set of integers, the odd integers, is not even a magma, see ~ oddinmgm . (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: 2zrngbas
blocks.content: The base set of R is the set of all even integers. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2zrngbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), diffss(s0, s1))
  ax-mp(wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wss(c0, cc))
  eqsstri(c0, cc, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  sstri(crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), cc, cz)
  ssrab2(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  zsscn()
  cnfldsrngbas(c0, c1)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 2zrngadd
blocks.content: The group addition operation of R is the addition of complex numbers. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: 2zrng0
blocks.content: The additive identity of R is the complex number 0. (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, c0))

} = {
  mp3an(wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, c0)), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(nat0, c1), wss(c1, cc))
  mp2b(wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cncrng()
  crngring(ccnfld)
  ringmnd(ccnfld)

blocks.name: 2zrngALT
blocks.content: The ring of integers restricted to the even integers is a (non-unital) ring, the "ring of even integers". Alternate version of ~ 2zrng , based on a restriction of the field of the complex numbers. The proof is based on the facts that the ring of even integers is an additive abelian group (see ~ 2zrngaabl ) and a multiplicative semigroup (see ~ 2zrngmsgrp ). (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: 2zrngnmlid
blocks.content: R has no multiplicative (left) identity. (Contributed by AV, 12-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2zrngnmlid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s2, cz, wrex(s3, cz, wceq(cv(s2), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s3))))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmgp, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
